t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Before you enroll, it’s a good idea to review eligibility requirements and other key information about Brand Registry enrollment. Let’s dive in. To enroll a brand in Brand Registry, your brand must have an active registered trademark or a pending trademark registration.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Sign in to your advertising console and click on “Brand Store.” · Start creating your Brand Store using Amazon’s self-service Store builder. You can use templates to build your pages. Use the drag-and-drop tiles to add, remove, or rearrange content in the template, or build your own design.
